channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Firefox for

item.title: CVE-2020-15647|2024-08-04T13:22:30.592Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for
item.description: A Content Provider in Firefox for Android allowed local files accessible by the browser to be read by a remote webpage, leading to sensitive data disclosure, including cookies for other origins. This vulnerability affects Firefox for < Android.
